data.name: Du assault Sp Hon
data.desc: Buccaneers or privateers attempt twice to sack Sp ships at Sto Tomás de Castillo
data.prim_n: Mus Nav Navarrete vol 23 ff 226-[missg] [Criado de Castilla a Rey a 28 jun 1606] / [missg] [Cabildo a Secretario a 18 mar 1606] / [missg] [a Procurador a 1607] / GUATEMALA,44A,N.35 [Cabildo a Rey a 9 jun 1606] / GUATEMALA,12,R.3,N.33 f 2r
data.note:
Possibly see 1607 Mauricio de Nasau assaults Truxillo / 1607 Pirates assault Puerto Caballos / 1613 Truxillo assaulted by Pirates, during which Alcalde of Truxillo dies /v Lujan 2 824
 Pir cruise Pto Caballos on sans action /GUATEMALA,12,R.3,N.33 f 2r
 Further see `/cartas` for more prim sources
